subject: Re: [junit] Migrating JMock parameterized tests from Junit 3.8.1 to 4.5
msgSnippet: Perhaps this is another opportunity to prod David. I ve been saying for a while that I d like to be able to compose runners, it shouldn t be that hard. S. ...
messageBody:
Perhaps this is another opportunity to prod David. I've been saying
for a while that I'd like to be able to compose runners, it shouldn't
be that hard.

S.

On 11 Nov 2008, at 11:46, Nat Pryce wrote:
> 2008/11/11 James Abley <james.abley@...>:
>> Is it a valid use case though, wanting to compose / mix runner
>> functionality?
>
> It is, but the JUnit API does not well support it yet.
>
> --Nat

Steve Freeman
http://www.mockobjects.com

Winner of the Agile Alliance Gordon Pask award 2006
